posts.post_title: WTB: Baker Piedmont and Bernhard in G-VG
posts.post_content:
Looking for decent centered examples of Baker (Piedmont) and Bernhard in G-VG condition.  Raw/Graded does not matter.  If interested in selling, please send a PM or email to [url]tbotticell@gmail.com[/url].

Thanks,

Tom
